author: vkhristenko
body:
similar to DataFormats/DetId updates for HcalDetid and HcalDigi

- put constexpr 
- move impls to header
- provide the tests
- available functionality allows
  - to get any hcal digi collection (hbhe / hf / ho qie8 ones + qie11/10 ones)
  - ship internals to the device
  - employ DataFrame classes on the gpu.
  - qie8 vs qie10/11 behave quite differently and examples of usage are in the tests

for reference (https://github.com/cms-patatrack/cmssw/pull/58)

__note: this sequence of commits touches DataFormats/Common edm::DataFrame.__ I had to mark most of that class member funcs as constexpr, except for those ctors that take edm::DataFrameContainer, cause then i would need to mark that guy as well
title: Hcal DetIds/Digi DataFrames adjustments to be used with cuda
